author: @callistazaraaurelia5609
text: Miracle Queen sends out a swarm of bees whose stings brainwash their victims. She summons all the temporary Miraculous holders, revealing their identities. Ladybug uses the Dragon Miraculous to unify into "Dragon Bug", and recovers the Snake Miraculous for Cat Noir to unify into "Snake Noir". Together, they battle their brainwashed allies and defeat Miracle Queen. Master Fu, as a turtle hero named "Jade Turtle" and being at Hawk Moth and Mayura's mercy, sacrifices his memories, formally transferring the title of Guardian of the Miraculous to Ladybug, who recovers the Miracle Box. Chloé is expelled from the superhero team, and she refuses to forgive Ladybug. In the aftermath, Fu reunites with Marianne, and the two leave Paris. Marinette and Adrien start dating Luka and Kagami, while Nathalie recovers Fu's tablet, which contains the decrypted spellbook.

author: @foreversolely
text: I HATE WHEN TEN OPENS HIS DAMN PRETTY MOUTH CAUSE WHY IS HE ALWAYS LETTING OUT THE MOST BEAUTIFUL ALLURING EAR PLEASING GRAMMY WORTHY VERSES KNOWN TO MANKIND HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO LIVE LIFE KNOWING THIS SONG EXISTS HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO LIVE LIFE KNOWING THAT IN A FEW YEARS ILL PROBABLY (HOPEFULLY NOT) WILL FORGET THIS SONG EXISTS FOR A MOMENT. MIRACLE WILL BE THE ONLY 'LULLABY' MY FUTURE KIDS WILL LISTEN TO. I WILL SING MIRACLE FOR THEM EVERY NIGHT ILL SING THIS SONG WITH GREAT ENTHUSIASM AND NEVER GET BORED OF IT THEYLL GET OBSESSED WITH THIS SONG JUST LIKE I AM AFTER THEY GROW UP THEYLL BE TAUGHT TO ALSO SING THIS SONG TO THEIR FUTURE KIDS THIS SONG WILL AND MUST BE PASSED TILL GENERATIONS OF MY BLOODLINE THIS SONG MUST ALWAYS BE KNOWN AND WILL BE REMARKED AS THE NATIONAL ANTHEM IN THIS FAMILY, WE'LL BE SINGING "WE BELIEVE IN MIRACLES~". IM OBSESSED AND WILL NEVER LIVE A DAY WITHOUT PLAYING THIS SONG ATLEAST 10 TIMES A DAY OR EVEN MORE. SPOTIFY ENDED MY SPOTIFY PREMIUM JUST A FEW DAYS AGO CUS THEY WERE MOST LIKELY TIRED OF ME PLAYING THIS SONG EVERY SINGLE MORNING AS IF IT WERE THE PLEDGE OF ALLEGIANCE AND WE WERE RELIVING OUR ELEMENTARY SCHOOL DAYS IM SORRY BUT I WILL CONTINUE TO LISTEN TO THIS SONG 3127 TIMES A DAY TILL MORNING TO NIGHT. IM SINCERLY SORRY AGAIN, BUT I SERIOUSLY CANT LIVE WITHOUT HEARING TEN, KUN AND XIAOJUNS VERSE AT 0:58 ITS A LIFE CHANGER A LIVE SAVER. I FEEL REALLY BAD FOR PEOPLE THAT DONT KNOW SUCH A SONG AND VERSE LIKE TEN, KUN AND XIAOJUN EXISTS. ANYTHING U REALLY WISH FOR WILL BE GRANTED TO U AFTER LISTENING TO THIS SONG GREAT PEOPLE WILL START COMING INTO YOUR LIFE YOULL ACHIEVE ANYTHING YOUVE BEEN GRIEVING FOR I SWEAR YOUR LIFE WILL BE CHANGED FOREVER AND I TRULY MEAN IT WITH MY WHOLE HEART. PLEASE SHARE AND RECOMMEND THIS SONG TO AS MANY PEOPLE AS YOU CAN YOU WILL CHANGE THEIR LIVES. YOULL BE CALLED A HERO, A LIFE CHANGER AND A LIFE SAVER YOULL BE CALLED THE HERO YOUVE ALWAYS DREAMT OF AS A KID THEYLL THANK YOU FOR DAYS THEYLL THANK YOU FOR BLESSING THEIR EYES AND EARS WITH SUCH A WONDERFUL, MAGESTIC, LIFE CHANGING, BEAUTIFUL, ASTONISHING, MELODIC, STUNNING, LOVELY AND SWEET SOUNDING SONG AND VIDEO. ONLY 8,869,578 MILLION PEOPLES LIVES HAVE BEEN CHANGED. its 4:54 am in the morning i have absolutely no clue how it took me 2 hours to write this maybe cause i was crying writing and describing such a beautiful song. 💚😞 no song will be better than Miracle, im sorry. 🙇‍♀️ have u ever seen someone describing a song with such.. passion? i think not. this song is indeed a MIRACLE. 😋

Fans of the cover group also abused WayV, said they are not famous in China. I am angry. Obviously, it is such a talented group, but SM wasted their youth.  Ten has been in SM for ten years, and I feel that he didn't get what he deserved.  Hope he will win the prize one day.

author: @seuleitt3439
text: I think this kind of concept should be the  main concept for WayV’s tittle tracks. I mean if we look back the most liked songs for the fans including me are such as love talk, nectar, action figure and this one of course. These kind of songs are sooooo WayV that thinking of some other group that can actually perform these tracks is so difficult almost impossible. And actually having this as their main concept and kind of song would help to get more fans into WayV and NCT cuz many people wrongly think that their music is just “noisy” when the real fans know it is not like that. They have a vast variety of songs from ballads to hip hop, it’s just amazing how versatile they are slaying in every genre of music. But still I would like to see WayV with this as their main concept cuz it makes noticeable why WayV is so different and unique. Anyways, waiting for WayV to slay with their comeback in the fourth quarter of the year. Maybe November or at the end of October who nows 👀 💚💚💚💚💚

author: @AmiyaD1611
text:
I‘m just comming back to say what everyone here probably has go say too, but it can‘t be said enough.
Gosh this song and WayV deserve so much more. This has been my favourite track from Universe (just like last time it was Nectar)
It‘s still on my Spotify On Replay ever since it out. 
Also every single one of them is so talented, they all stand out in their unqiue distinct ways, every member is strong on their own, and as a group they always striked me to be very well balanced (and yes very crazy too! hahaha) 
It‘s been so fun seeing them grow since their Debut with all the variety shows, and it makes me sad due to many events (which I won‘t be specifically mentioning on here) that they couldn‘t get a comback as OT7 again.
I hope SM has some big plans for these boys in 2022, because they deserve the world<3

Also I know it‘s not the lyrics but I still can‘t stop hearing Hendery say around 0:50 Really I just want a B**ch, tryna feel alive

and it‘s still funny everytime😂

author: @msb5775
text:
My ranking of WayV’s English:

Ten and Yang Yang: completely fluent and confident without many grammar mistakes

Xiaojun and Hendery: seem pretty fluent but we’ve never really seen them have conversations, just bits and pieces in livestreams and such

Winwin: seems like he understands almost everything in English. He can also speak basic English with confidence (like when he and Hendery had the conversation about being prince-like and who’s the best cook on winformation) but probably not hold a conversation.

Lucas: afaik he’s never actually spoken English on camera except for small phrases here and there. But I think he understands a lot of English since he says random stuff in English all the time (oh YOU are nana???). It’s unclear how much he speaks

Kun: still unclear because I don’t think he’s spoken in English on camera either. But I’m guessing he doesn’t understand completely because of things he’s said in the past (how he only understood part of the lyrics for love talk, how he thought his song title was “slapless” instead of “sleepless”)

author: @msb5775
text: WayV is clearly trying to do music in English to appeal to a broader audience (Xiaojun & Kun promoted their subunit song in English and Chinese and performed it in English during the SM free concert, Ten did his solo comeback in English, Ten & Yang Yang did their subunit comeback in English, and now Miracle which is their group song for the NCT album). And since their debut they’ve done great English songs like Love Talk and Bad Alive too. I hope they get recognized more in the English market and can do some promotions abroad as WayV like Ten and Lucas did for SuperM.

author: @미노-d7e
text:
미라클 무대 제발 스엠 제발 음방 제발 퍼포먼스 비디오라도 안무 영상이라도 제발 스엠분들.. 이런 곡을 그냥 이러고 말면 안 되죠.. 음방 나가면 웨이션 레전드 무대 될 것 같은데요.. 저 이런 곡 너무 좋아해요 스엠.. 저 진짜 최애 영상에도 댓글 잘 안 다는데 이 곡을 그냥 트랙비디오랑 음원으로만 남긴 다는 건 말이 안 돼요..
진짜 진짜 제발 나중이라도 좀 괜찮아지면 콘이나 축제 같은 곳에서 해주세요.. 미라클 류양양을 음방으로 보고 싶습니다.. 스엠 진짜 수만쌤 어떻게 안 될까요 어떻게 해야 제 ㅈ ㅣㄴ심이 전해지죠 스엠 저 지금 미라클만 무한 반복하고 있어요 아 진짜 정재현 아이라잌미베러도 놔두고 미라클만 보고 듣고 있는데 진쯔.. 스엠 와 어떻게 안 될까요 이렇게 댓글 길게 써 본 적도 처음이네요 수만쌤.. 권이사님 유이사님.. 켄지 엄마.. 시티....

author: @stephan01st60
text:
Let’s 🎤 [Lyrics from Snippet]

[Intro: Yangyang]
Hey, okay
Breath closer, come closer

[Chorus: Ten, Kun, Xiaojun]
I believe in miracles (Energy like that)
Something more than physical
So give me that
We, we, we, we can just grow that, grow that
We ain't gotta hold back, hold back, girl
I believe in miracles, you got me saying

[Post-Chorus: All, Hendery]
Oh, oh (That's right)
Oh, oh, oh (You got me saying)
Give me that
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh

[Verse: Yangyang, Ten, Hendery]
I said, "Liberate your conscience"
The world is shifting lately
You feel it in the KOSMO, all the love we made
Transcending ego, look, we got it all
No strеss when we breathing, I, I, I, I
Rеal with the feeling, it's true
Human nature, innovate it, if you feeling it too
Really, I just wanna reach, tryna feel alive
All the love and the peace that I feel tonight
Yeah, that's right
[Pre-Chorus: Ten, Kun, Xiaojun]
Turn off the lights and glow
I'm in the water low
Give me by yourself
Let's connect and fly
Dreams can take you far
Find out who you really are
I'm in the orbit, let it take me
And it's more than physical

[Chorus: Kun, Xiaojun, Hendery, Yangyang]
I believe in miracles (Baby, I believe in miracles)
Energy like that
Something more than physical
So give me that
We, we, we, we can just grow that, grow that (Grow that)
We ain't gotta hold back (We ain't gotta hold back, baby), hold back, girl
I believe in miracles (Ayy, ayy)
Girl, you got me saying

[Post-Chorus: All, Yangyang, Xiaojun, Hendery]
Oh, oh (Don't stop)
Oh, oh, oh (Girl, you got me saying)
Oh, oh (Ayy, ayy)
Oh, oh, oh (Woo)
Give me that
[Outro: Ten, Hendery, Xiaojun, Yangyang, *Kun*]
Oh, nah, nah
We don't like long distance
Something been missing
Oh, nah, nah
If you're near or you're far
It don't matter where you are, now I'm there
*Oh, nah, nah*
Yeah, I found that you, I think I found that you
Yeah, we found (Oh, nah, nah)
Baby, I believe in miracles

author: @Papalapotato
text: This Song gives me 2000's Fuck boi anthem, which is pretty fitting for Wayv's brand after love talk 😏. I like the intro. It was kind of basic though the intro was not that distinct kind of basic in fact. As well as the phrase "I believe in miracles," when Ten said that in the beginning I thought this was going to be a cliché/ cheese song, I was kind of repulse, but as the phrase transpired into the chorus with the Oh Na NA it was very hypnotic and catchy. Perhaps the reason behind why I perceived that was imparted that most fully English songs are pretty cringe predominantly since they do not translate the words and emotions correctly into english as the lyrics in English are often one dimensional and dull. But this song really is not like any of those songs this song fully encompassed the concept. There was emotion and great profiency of expression, except for the intro cause that was very obvious, it was sticking out like a sore thumb, that noticeable. Great song as always!

author: @daniczzzaale1083
text:
Hey, okay. Breathe closer, come closer
I believe in miracles (Energy like that)
Something more than physical
So give me that
We, we, we, we can just grow that, grow that
We ain't gotta hold back, hold back, girl
I believe in miracles, you got me saying

[Post-Chorus: All, Hendery]
Oh, oh (That's right)
Oh, oh, oh (You got me saying)
Give me that
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
I said, "Liberate your conscience"
The world is shifting lately
You feel it in the KOSMO, all the love we made
Transcending ego, look, we got it all
No stress when we breathing, I, I, I, I
Real with the feeling, it's true
Hit my nature, innovate it, if you feeling it too
Really, I just wanna reach, tryna feel alive
All the love and the peace that I feel tonight
Yeah, that's right
Turn off the lights and glow
I'm in the water low
Give me by yourself
Let's connect and fly
Dreams can take you far
Find out who you really are
I'm in love, in love, you tame me
And it's more than physical

[Chorus: Kun, Xiaojun, Hendery, Yangyang]
I believe in miracles (Baby, I believe in miracles)
Energy like that
Something more than physical
So give me that
We don't like long distance
Something been missing
Oh, nah, nah
If you're near or you're far
It don't matter where you are, now I'm there
*Oh, nah, nah*
Yeah, I found that you, I think I found that you
Yeah, we found (Oh, nah, nah)
Baby, I believe in miracles

author: @aicrtle
text:
Intro: Yangyang]
Hey, okay
Breathe closer, come closer

[Chorus: Ten, Kun, Xiaojun]
I believe in miracles (Energy like that)
Something more than physical
So give me that
We, we, we, we can just grow that, grow that
We ain't gotta hold back, hold back, girl
I believe in miracles, you got me saying

[Post-Chorus: All, Hendery]
Oh, oh (That's right)
Oh, oh, oh (You got me saying)
Give me that
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh

[Verse: Yangyang, Ten, Hendery]
I said, "Liberate your conscience"
The world is shifting lately
You feel it in the KOSMO, all the love we made
Transcending ego, look, wе got it all
No stress when we brеathing, I, I, I, I
Real with the feeling, it's true
Hit my nature, innovate it, if you feeling it too
Really, I just wanna reach, tryna feel alive
All the love and the peace that I feel tonight
Yeah, that's right

[Pre-Chorus: Ten, Kun, Xiaojun]
Turn off the lights and glow
I'm in the water low
Give me by yourself
Let's connect and fly
Dreams can take you far
Find out who you really are
I'm in love, in love, you tame me
And it's more than physical

[Chorus: Kun, Xiaojun, Hendery, Yangyang]
I believe in miracles (Baby, I believe in miracles)
Energy like that
Something more than physical
So give me that
We, we, we, we can just grow that, grow that (Grow that)
We ain't gotta hold back (We ain't gotta hold back, baby), hold back, girl
I believe in miracles (Ayy, ayy)
Girl, you got me saying

[Post-Chorus: All, Yangyang, Xiaojun, Hendery]
Oh, oh (Don't stop)
Oh, oh, oh (Girl, you got me saying)
Oh, oh (Ayy, ayy)
Oh, oh, oh (Woo)
Give me that

[Outro: Ten, Hendery, Xiaojun, Yangyang, *Kun*]
Oh, nah, nah
We don't like long distance
Something been missing
Oh, nah, nah
If you're near or you're far
It don't matter where you are, now I'm there
*Oh, nah, nah*
Yeah, I found that you, I think I found that you
Yeah, we found (Oh, nah, nah)
Baby, I believe in miracles

author: @lupitamdc
text:
[Intro: Yangyang]
Hey, okay
Breathe closer, come closer

[Chorus: Ten, Kun, Xiaojun]
I believe in miracles (Energy like that)
Something more than physical
So give me that
We, we, we, we can just grow that, grow that
We ain't gotta hold back, hold back, girl
I believe in miracles, you got me saying

[Post-Chorus: All, Hendery]
Oh, oh (That's right)
Oh, oh, oh (You got me saying)
Give me that
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh

[Verse: Yangyang, Ten, Hendery]
I said, "Liberate your conscience"
The world is shifting lately
You feel it in the KOSMO, all the love we made
Transcending ego, look, wе got it all
No stress when we brеathing, I, I, I, I
Real with the feeling, it's true
Hit my nature, innovate it, if you feeling it too
Really, I just wanna reach, tryna feel alive
All the love and the peace that I feel tonight
Yeah, that's right
[Pre-Chorus: Ten, Kun, Xiaojun]
Turn off the lights and glow
I'm in the water low
Give me by yourself
Let's connect and fly
Dreams can take you far
Find out who you really are
I'm in love, in love, you tame me
And it's more than physical

[Chorus: Kun, Xiaojun, Hendery, Yangyang]
I believe in miracles (Baby, I believe in miracles)
Energy like that
Something more than physical
So give me that
We, we, we, we can just grow that, grow that (Grow that)
We ain't gotta hold back (We ain't gotta hold back, baby), hold back, girl
I believe in miracles (Ayy, ayy)
Girl, you got me saying

[Post-Chorus: All, Yangyang, Xiaojun, Hendery]
Oh, oh (Don't stop)
Oh, oh, oh (Girl, you got me saying)
Oh, oh (Ayy, ayy)
Oh, oh, oh (Woo)
Give me that
[Outro: Ten, Hendery, Xiaojun, Yangyang, *Kun*]
Oh, nah, nah
We don't like long distance
Something been missing
Oh, nah, nah
If you're near or you're far
It don't matter where you are, now I'm there
*Oh, nah, nah*
Yeah, I found that you, I think I found that you
Yeah, we found (Oh, nah, nah)
Baby, I believe in miracles

They must give so many opportunities to show their talents such as Ten showing their creativity by designing Wayv's merchandise, rainbow's contents, etc. Give them so many come back just a minimum of twice in a year. author: @Biya-uk3zi
text:
I just wanna sing along, so here we go

[Intro: Yangyang]
Hey, okay
Breathe closer, come closer

[Chorus: Ten, Kun, Xiaojun]
I believe in miracles
Energy like that
Something more than physical
So give me that
We, we, we, we can just grow that, grow that
We ain't gotta hold back, hold back, girl
I believe in miracles
You got me saying

[Post-Chorus: All, Hendery]
Oh, oh (That's right)
Oh, oh, oh (You got me saying)
Give me that
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh

[Verse: Yangyang, Ten, Hendery]
I said, "Liberate your conscience"
The world is shifting lately
You feel it in the KOSMO, all the love we made
Transcending ego, look, wе got it all
No stress when we brеathing, I, I, I, I
Real with the feeling, it's true
Hit my nature, innovate it, if you feeling it too
Really, I just wanna reach, tryna feel alive
All the love and the peace that I feel tonight
Yeah, that's right

[Pre-Chorus: Ten, Kun, Xiaojun]
Turn off the lights and glow
I'm in the water low
Give me by yourself
Let's connect and fly
Dreams can take you far
Find out who you really are
I'm in a love, in love, you tame me
And it's more than physical

[Chorus: Kun, Xiaojun, Hendery, Yangyang]
I believe in miracles (Baby, I believe in miracles)
Energy like that
Something more than physical
So give me that
We, we, we, we can just grow that, grow that (Grow that)
We ain't gotta hold back (We ain't gotta hold back, baby), hold back, girl
I believe in miracles (Ayy, ayy)
Girl, you got me saying

[Post-Chorus: All, Yangyang, Xiaojun, Hendery]
Oh, oh (Don't stop)
Oh, oh, oh (Girl, you got me saying)
Oh, oh (Ayy, ayy)
Oh, oh, oh (Woo)
Give me that

[Outro: Ten, Hendery, Xiaojun, Yangyang, *Kun*]
Oh, nah, nah
We don't like long distance
Something been missing
Oh, nah, nah
If you're near or you're far
It don't matter where you are, now I'm there
*Oh, nah, nah*
Yeah, I found that you
I think I found that you
Yeah, we found
Oh, nah, nah
Baby, I believe in miracles

author: @alpockiy5189
text:
(I hope i will not say something offensive) but WAYV DEFINITELY ATE THIS, this group has soooo much potential if only SM/Label V give them proper treatment and promotion. Almost everyone in this group are decent dancers, they have best vocalists, and great rappers, not to mention their dreamy visuals 😭 if the company can push them into a global group i believe wayv will slay as well, they are bunch of multilingual kings. Please please expand their market soon 😭😭🙏🙏 

Also whether it's a solo like PMN, duo like Back To You, Low Low, and Jalapeno (i know 😅), or even five members formation like this, they still able to show their great potentials omg... WAYV truly never disappoints!! I can't wait for the true amazing comeback next year just like what Winwin said ahfjdjjsjs i reaaallllyyyy cant wait for that 😭 i miss him so much i really do and i believe the actor Dong Sicheng will also surprise us in a good way bcs i believe he will also show his best potential as well!

author: @gemrusfernandez9811
text:
I dunno why some czennies find it so hard to support WayV when they are literally just another unit of NCT. I mean I'm not even here for a long time, I just got into the fandom last year, although I've been lowkey supporting NCT dream,127 and U because I haven't heard about WayV before since I'm not an official stan, blame EXO HAHAHA

But anyways, everyone in NCT as a whole are all talented,visually amazing and super fun! I might even have to place WayV as the first place when it comes to being the funniest unit, all of em are just crackheads. 

And I also don't understand other czennies who start fandom wars between 127 and Dream. Like, wtf y'all doing? They're literally just in the same group, they all love and treasure each other. So please let us just support them equally and never make them feel like they are less than the other units coz when it comes to it, your fave idols from Dream,127 and WayV become one in NCT U, so y'all are just fighting a useless fight haha

author: @leslyesanchez8931
text:
Mi top 3 de grupos masculinos: 
1°EXO/WAYV 2°NCT 127 3°NCT DREAM
Y pensar que nunca iba a querer a otro grupo así como a EXO, me alegra haber conocido a WayV. Desde que los escuche el año pasado sin saber que era subunidad de NCT, no me guíe por eso, si no por su música, me enganché y nunca más los dejé, estoy feliz por ellos... no anden tristes pronto los veremos juntos, a los 7. 
EL TALENTO QUE LLEVA WAYV COMO GRUPO ES ENORME, COMPOSITORES, LETRISTAS, COREOGRAFOS, VOCALES, RAPEROS, etc... ELLOS PUEDEN HACER SU MUSICA PROPIA, como fan: orgullosa. Pero más que yo, espero que ellos tambien sean felices y que el MUNDO PUEDA APRECIAR SU TALENTO.
La barrera del idioma es nada para mi, los amo como son, cada uno es único. APOYEMOS A WAYV y devolvemos con amor  las alegrías que nos dan.

text:
YES!! WAYV IN THE HOUSE!! THIS IS A BOP!!!!
For a moment when I heard the beat and then a voice rapping I thought SM had really gone and debuted Mark into WayV!!  Then I realized it was our baby YangYang spitting bars like fire!! Hendery also slayed his rap part!! Xiaojun sounding all angelic and Kun being his smooth self!! I need no words for Ten's flawless performance as usual! And Ten is rocking the turquoise/teal hair!! WayV dishing out the visuals!! The R&B fits WayV well. Of course WayV is not complete with LuWin's absence, but I am confident that the 5 remaining members will slay every performance!! Until their return WAYV FIGHTING!!!

text:
The vibe of the song is good, fun and sexy, not so dark. Unfortunately there are still some members who are rigid in terms of expression even though they are very handsome. Even though WayV is easy to smile and friendly. But the one who is quite/more appropriate in expression here is xiaojun, if it's ten & kun that's fine, emmm hendery and that one doesn't match the expression. Sorry, this is just my opinion as far as I can see, they are all cool but it's always true that every member in a group has weaknesses, not just advantages.
The songs were great yesterday's nct dream and this wayv, can't wait for universe album, NCT 2021 fighting!
